name: ローン - Roon Azur Lane LORA. / ローン (アズールレーン)
description:
22th Release, ローン - Roon From Azur Lane.

Put everything in Filter for seeing all images!

Click on Show more for Weight & Trigger recommendation, Also click on About This Version at Right Corner for more Info.

I just wanted a Lora of Roon & People requested me Azur Lane Character, so there you go.

This Lora is trained on 244+ Images, I sorted everything manually, Only picked the best possible. (SFW + NFSW)

AnimeFullFinalPrunedFP16 used, so he work with the majority of Anime Model, you can see in examples images.

Well, he can do Default skin (Most Precise) + Roon-U Skin (Precision is Ok.)+ Dark Red Grin Skin (Middle Precise) + Viridescent Lullaby Skin (Low datasets Less Precise), See Examples images for prompts.

Flexibility is Ok.

About Trigger Words & Prompts: RoonV4 (For Trigger) & for prompts just refer to examples images.

Weight recommended: 0.6-1.

Negative Embedding used: EasyNegative, BadPrompt2 and sometime negative_hand-neg.

Leave a Review & Share you're image in comments if you appreciate this Work :).

PS: I'm Working on An Amagi Lora, it's already finished i will release it soon. (The Quality Output is Insane.)

modelVersions.name: V4
modelVersions.description:
I pruned Brown eyes, so normally you don't need to put in prompt, but if they don't appear Brown put: ((Brown eyes)) prompt.

For Skin, put 0.6-0.8 Weight, See examples Image for this.

For Flexibility for like clothes that don't exist put 0.6 - 0.8 Weight, See my Examples images for this.

Also if you don't want something to appear, put it in Negative Prompt.
